cast.original_title: All Quiet on the Western Front
cast.overview: When a group of idealistic young men join the German Army during the Great War, they are assigned to the Western Front, where their patriotism is destroyed by the harsh realities of combat.
cast.title: All Quiet on the Western Front

details.biography: Jack McHugh was born on May 25, 1913 in Deer Lodge, Montana, USA. He was an actor, known for Stick to Your Story (1926), Chinatown Nights (1929) and Space Patrol (1950). He died on January 13, 1983 in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.
details.name: Jack McHugh
